ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, panzwě sɔɔnmbʉ́a

Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gÿo atsɔ́ mmó gie á pú sí, ḿbiŋ ńgẅiin legúʼ, à sáʼa tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Ésàlayɛ. Epʉ̀a pie é ka tsɔgɔ tsɛ̀ɛ wɔɔn ngwòŋ, é kág, mé piŋ ńgÿo mekùʼ mɔ́b, ńtí shúm léjÿó sie é ge ne zéme tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ wɔ́b.
en: On that day the Branch   of the Lord will be beautiful and glorious,  # 4:2 2Sm 23:4–5; Ps 132:17; Jr 23:5; 33:15; Zch 3:8; 6:12 and the fruit of the land  # 4:2 Ps 72:16; Is 27:6 will be the pride and glory  # 4:2 Is 3:18 of Israel’s survivors.  # 4:2 Gn 45:7; Jdg 21:17; 2Kg 19:30–31; Is 10:20; 37:31–32; Jl 2:32; Ob 17

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, epʉ̀a pie é ge láʼ gwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Siyoŋ, tà mbɔɔ pie é ge láʼ gwɔ́ Yelúzálèm, mé tóŋo wɔ́b lê pandʉalʉ̌a. Mé gɔɔn pʉ̀a metsèm pie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la pú ńŋweʼe mezíŋ mɔ́b tsɛ̀ɛ lepuʼú ŋwàʼne sé, legwɔ́ gie pɔ́ gẅiin legwɔ́, á Yelúzálèm.
en: Whoever remains in Zion and whoever is left in Jerusalem   will be called holy  # 4:3 Is 52:1; 62:12  #— #all in Jerusalem written in the book of life  # 4:3 Lit Jerusalem recorded for life,# 4:3 Ex 32:32; Ps 69:28; 87:6; 139:16; Is 49:16; Ezk 13:9; Mal 3:16; Lk 10:20; Ac 13:48  #— #

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge gÿo gwɔ́ tà lɔgɔ zẅìge gie á gÿo mé gwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ ḿbiŋ ńgwɔ́ té ncÿǒ, ésɔg ncÿǒ na púɔngùɔ siyoŋ, é gíŋe sɔg metse mie mé la pfɛte Yelúzálèm,
en: when the Lord has washed away the filth   of the daughters of Zion and cleansed the bloodguilt  # 4:4 Is 1:15; 3:13–15 from the heart of Jerusalem by a spirit of judgment  # 4:4 Is 28:6 and a spirit of burning.  # 4:4 Is 1:31; 9:19; 33:14; Mal 3:2; Mt 3:11; Lk 3:17

ngiemboon: é leen ké gʉa jʉʼ ntsèm ndùm lekwɛ́ Siyoŋ, tà mbɔɔ na mecúʼtè, é gÿo melɔ́ɔn gwɔ́ wó fʉ̀ʼʉ zsǒ, à piŋ ńgwɔ́ letsẅɛ́ʼ, ndyé gẅie é kẅɛɛ na lʉ́me mmɔ̌g gie à pú ńkyɛʼɛ jʉʼ, e gwɔ́ wó. Legúʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge gÿo pwoon jʉʼ páʼ máamáa kábte,
en: Then the Lord will create   a cloud of smoke by day  # 4:5 Ex 13:21–22; 14:20; 40:34; Nm 9:15–23 and a glowing flame of fire by night over the entire site of Mount Zion and over its assemblies. For there will be a canopy over all the glory,  # 4:5 Or For glory will be a canopy over all

ngiemboon: mbɔɔ páʼ meffo shúm mie mé lɔ̌g ńzáb ntsɔ̀ʼ mentàb, é náa jʉʼʉ sẅisẅê fʉ̀ʼ gie nèm ne ńtʉ́a; ḿbiŋe ńkẅéte páʼ ńgwɔ́ mé kÿo mbʉ̀ŋ pɔ́ fóm ńtyé wó.
en: and there will be a shelter for shade from heat by day and a refuge and shelter from storm and rain.
